dr.evomodel.epidemiology.casetocase
Class TransmissionExchangeOperatorA

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.evomodel.operators.AbstractTreeOperator
          dr.evomodel.epidemiology.casetocase.TransmissionExchangeOperatorA
All Implemented Interfaces:
MCMCOperator
public class TransmissionExchangeOperatorA
extends AbstractTreeOperator

Implements branch exchange operations that leave the transmission network unchanged. As this already severely restricts the set of eligible pairs of nodes, this is set up as special case of Wide Exchange.

Author:
Matthew Hall
